headline: Evercore ISI Maintains a Buy on Regeneron Pharmaceuticals (REGN) With a $750 PT
summary: Regeneron Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (NASDAQ:REGN) is one of the best affordable growth stocks to buy. In a report released on August 27, Cory Kasimov from Evercore ISI maintained a Buy rating on Regeneron Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (NASDAQ:REGN), setting a price target of $750.00. headline: Merck KGaA, Darmstadt, Germany, Appoints David Weinreich as New Global Head of R&D and Chief Medical Officer for Healthcare Business Sector
summary: DARMSTADT, Germany, September 02, 2025--Merck KGaA, Darmstadt, Germany, a leading science and technology company, today announced the appointment of David Weinreich, MD, MBA, as Global Head of R&D and Chief Medical Officer for its Healthcare business sector.
